com.gwt.ss.client.loginable

Interface HasLoginHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLoginBox

    public interface HasLoginHandler
extends com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers
    A interface interact with front user for processing login action, and add a LoginHandler to receive login result.
    Important: when start Login}, no matter login succeeded or canceled, It must fire a LoginEvent to notify the waiting LoginableService.
    實做此界面之物件可讓用戶啟始登錄作業，並透過 LoginHandler接收登錄結果
    注意: 一旦啟動登錄，無論 登錄成功或用戶取消登錄，都一定要發送LoginEvent給等待中的LoginableService.
    Author:
    Kent Yeh
